title: Calculation
text: Multiply the second equation by $$2$$ and add the first equation to it: $$2\left(3y+2z\right)+3x-4z=2\left(-3\right)+0$$

title: Calculating

title: Calculating
text: Multiply the third equation by $$2$$ and subtract with $$3x+6y=6$$: $$2\left(2x+3y\right)-3x+6y=2\left(-5\right)-\left(-6\right)$$
